Yes, there are several ways to find a good massage therapist who has experience in treating anxiety and depression. Here are some suggestions:

1. Ask for referrals from your doctors or mental health professionals - They may be able to recommend a massage therapist who has experience in treating anxiety and depression.

2. Check online directories - You can use websites like Yelp, Google Reviews, or Healthgrades to find massage therapists in your area. Look for reviews from other clients to get an idea of their experience with treating anxiety and depression.

3. Look for massage therapists who specialize in treating mental health conditions - Some massage therapists offer specialized services for clients with anxiety or depression. Look for massage therapists who have additional training or certifications in treating mental health conditions.

4. Interview the massage therapist - Before booking a massage, speak with the therapist to ask about their experience in treating anxiety and depression. Ask about their qualifications, training, and experience with similar cases.

5. Try a few sessions - It's important to find the right therapist who makes you feel comfortable and understood. Consider trying a few sessions with different therapists to find the one that works best for you.

Remember to always consult with your doctor or mental health professional before starting any new treatments, including massage therapy.
